object.content:
Fix Nexus 7 (2013) GPS Problem

Is your brand-new Nexus 7 having problems with its GPS? It seems as though if you use the GPS (say, in Navigation), then switch to another app, the GPS suddenly starts "Searching for location" and will not stop doing so until you reboot. Fear no more, I've found a way to fix it!

1. Install GPS Test from Google Play (http://goo.gl/Uj9VKf).
2. Open the app and press Menu -> Settings.
3. Press "Clear AGPS," wait a few seconds, then press "Update AGPS."
4. Reboot your tablet.

Your GPS should now perform quite admirably! Please share this so that others with the same problem can see the fix too. Enjoy your tablet!
